about_the_game:
Embark on a Dreamlike Adventure in Imaginytes - Where Imagination Meets Strategy!

Imaginytes is a captivating blend of roguelite, tower defense, and deckbuilding set in a vibrant fantasy dreamworld. Explore a realm where imagination comes to life and time adds an exciting twist to every decision.

Face the dark forces of nightmares in beautiful, procedurally generated maps, ensuring no two battles are ever the same!

Defend with Your Imaginytes

Summon Imaginytes onto the hex grid battlefield. With more than 50 unique sets of Imaginytes to collect, each coming in 3 stages of evolution, you’ll need to strategically place and upgrade your Imaginytes to fend off waves of enemy nightmare creatures.

Build Your Dream Deck

Throughout your journey (Dream), you’ll craft a powerful deck of Imaginyte cards and spell cards. These cards are not just your tools, but your lifeline, each with the potential to be upgraded in countless ways. Can you find the perfect synergy?

Unique Time Mechanic

In Imaginytes, time is an essential and unique mechanic. Every action, from placing Imaginytes to casting spells, consumes time, and as time advances, new waves of enemies will emerge. Manage your time wisely to stay ahead of the nightmare forces!

Cast Powerful Spells

Turn the tide of battle by casting spells to buff your Imaginytes or damage your enemies. With a variety of spells at your disposal, the right choice at the right time can mean the difference between victory and defeat.

                 

Evolve and Enhance

Experience the thrill of evolving your Imaginytes through their 3 evolution tiers. Each evolution brings stronger powers and abilities to help you conquer the nightmares. Plus,  during your dreams you will find different enchantments, that can alter your Imaginytes in various different ways.

                       

   

Traits and Synergies

Imaginytes aren’t just creatures. They’re part of a grander design. With different Traits like Beast, Bot, Wise, and more, you can craft decks that benefit from these synergies. The more you collect of the same Trait, the more powerful your synergies becomes!

Top off your synergies with more than 120 different artifacts you will discover during your dreams. Artifacts will provide unique buffs, tailoring your playstyle to your liking.

Talents to Empower Your Dreams

As you journey through Imaginytes, unlock powerful talents that you can set before each Dream. Talents provide lasting upgrades, helping you tailor your strategies and gain new advantages for future runs. With each Dream, you’ll grow stronger, allowing for new strategies and deeper gameplay with every run.

Endless Replayability

Every Dream is a new adventure. Unlock new Imaginytes, spells, and artifacts with each run, ensuring that no two Dreams are ever the same. The more you play, the more your arsenal grows, keeping the game fresh and exciting.

Are you ready to awaken your imagination, master a unique time mechanic, and embark on a journey through the dreamscapes?

The world of Imaginytes awaits—where every Dream is a new challenge and every nightmare can be vanquished with the power of imagination!

Add to your wishlist and prepare to dream big!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra) or higher
  • Processor: Apple M1 chip or Intel Core i5 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Apple M1 GPU or Intel UHD 630 or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 12 (Monterey) or higher
  • Processor: Apple M1/M2 chip or Intel Core i7 or higher
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1/M2 GPU
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

name: Imaginytes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Step into the world of Imaginytes - a Roguelite Deckbuilder meets Tower Defense! Collect, Summon and Evolve Imaginytes, cast Powerful Spells, find Game-Changing Artifacts and Defend your Dreams against relentless Nightmares.
